columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the secret.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a secret uniquely.

columns.name: vault_name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the vault.

columns.name: enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the secret is enabled, or not.

columns.name: managed
columns.description: Indicates whether the secret's lifetime is managed by key vault, or not.

columns.name: content_type
columns.description: Specifies the type of the secret value such as a password.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Specifies the time when the secret is created.

columns.name: expires_at
columns.description: Specifies the time when the secret will expire.

columns.name: kid
columns.description: If this is a secret backing a KV certificate, then this field specifies the corresponding key backing the KV certificate.

columns.name: not_before
columns.description: Specifies the time before which the secret is not usable.

columns.name: recoverable_days
columns.description: Specifies the soft delete data retention days. Value should be >=7 and <=90 when softDelete enabled, otherwise 0.

columns.name: recovery_level
columns.description: The deletion recovery level currently in effect for the object. If it contains 'Purgeable', then the object can be permanently deleted by a privileged user; otherwise, only the system can purge the object at the end of the retention interval.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Specifies the time when the secret was last updated.
